Author: ZeenyxThePhoenix
Text: I felt extremely guilty when I ate at maintenance a couple weeks ago, like I'm wasting time. It's a tough battle but sometimes you have to cut yourself some slack.

Author: hemingweights
Text: It’s that internal battle between wanting to make healthy choices while also reaching your goals. That line between “healthy weight loss/management” and disordered eating/dysfunctional thinking is so fine for us and so easy to cross. Your feelings of guilt may just be your brain and body begging you to not cross that line.
